entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Victoria
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:09 PM PST Friday 06 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Rain, 8.7°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Victoria Int'l Airport 5:13 PM PST Friday 06 January 2023
Condition: Light Rain
Temperature: 8.7°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.2 kPa falling
Visibility: 32.2 km
Humidity: 77 %
Dewpoint: 4.9°C
Wind: SSE 15 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of showers. Low 7. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of showers this evening then partly cloudy. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 except gusting to 70 near Haro Strait. Low 7. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Friday 06 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of showers. Temperature steady near 8. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of showers late in the morning and in the afternoon. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light in the afternoon. Temperature steady near 8. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Friday 06 January 2023
